## Langchain Embeddings[](#langchain-embeddings "Permalink to this heading")

from langchain.embeddings import HuggingFaceEmbeddings
from llama\_index import ServiceContext, set\_global\_service\_context

embed\_model \= HuggingFaceEmbeddings(
    model\_name\="sentence-transformers/all-mpnet-base-v2"
)

service\_context \= ServiceContext.from\_defaults(embed\_model\=embed\_model)

\# optionally set a global service context
set\_global\_service\_context(service\_context)
